links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

links.title: U.S. Stock Market Returns Around Thanksgiving
links.description: Does the Thanksgiving holiday, a time of families celebrating plenty, give U.S. stock investors a sense of optimism that translates into stock returns? To investigate, we analyze the historical behavior of the S&P 500 Index during the three trading days before and the three trading days after the holiday.
